title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 26.2 - Mailing of notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 26.2 - Mailing of notice

State Regulations

Notice of discontinuance to a milk producer shall be sent
by the dealer, certified mail, return receipt requested, and a copy of the
notice shall at the same time be sent to the commissioner, by first class mail, directed to the attention of the Division of Dairy Industry Services. The
30-day period shall commence on the date of receipt of the written notice by
the milk producer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
26.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
